card0.name: Bulbasaur
card0.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKEMON.

card1.name: Charizard
card1.description: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

card2.name: Squirtle
card2.description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

card3.description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
card3.name: Caterpie

card4.name: Weedle
card4.description: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

card5.name: Pidgey
card5.description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

card6.name: Rattata
card6.description: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

card7.name: Spearow
card7.description: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.

card8.name: Ekans
card8.description: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.

card9.name: Pikachu
card9.description: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.

card10.name: Nidoran♀
card10.description: Females are more sensitive to smells than males. While foraging, they all use their whiskers to check wind direction and stay downwind of predators.

card11.name: Nidoran♂
card11.description: The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead contains a powerful poison. This is a very cautious Pokemon, always straining its large ears.

card12.name: Meowth
card12.description: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.

card13.name: Golduck
card13.description: When it swims at full speed using its long, webbed limbs, its forehead somehow begins to glow.

card14.description: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.
card14.name: Growlithe

card15.name: Poliwag
card15.description: For Poliwag, swimming is easier than walking. The swirl pattern on its belly is actually part of the Pokemon's innards showing through the skin.

card16.name: Bellsprout
card16.description: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.

card17.name: Magnemite
card17.description: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.

card18.name: Miraidon
card18.description: Much remains unknown about this creature. It resembles Cyclizar, but it is far more ruthless and powerful.
